description: Returns detailed information about a member. Applies only to Hyperledger Fabric.

parameters.name: NetworkId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the network to which the member belongs.

parameters.name: MemberId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the member.

nested_items.name: NetworkId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the network to which the member belongs.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the member.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the member.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: An optional description for the member.

nested_items.name: FrameworkAttributes
nested_items.description: Attributes relevant to a member for the blockchain framework that the Managed Blockchain network uses.

nested_items.name: AdminUsername
nested_items.description: The user name for the initial administrator user for the member.

nested_items.name: CaEndpoint
nested_items.description: The endpoint used to access the member's certificate authority.

nested_items.name: LogPublishingConfiguration
nested_items.description: Configuration properties for logging events associated with a member.

nested_items.name: Cloudwatch
nested_items.description: Parameters for publishing logs to Amazon CloudWatch Logs.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether logging is enabled.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of a member.
CREATING - The Amazon Web Services account is in the process of creating a member.
AVAILABLE - The member has been created and can participate in the network.
CREATE_FAILED - The Amazon Web Services account attempted to create a member and creation failed.
UPDATING - The member is in the process of being updated.

DELETING - The member and all associated resources are in the process of being deleted. Either the Amazon Web Services account that owns the member deleted it, or the member is being deleted as the result of an APPROVED PROPOSAL to remove the member.

DELETED - The member can no longer participate on the network and all associated resources are deleted. Either the Amazon Web Services account that owns the member deleted it, or the member is being deleted as the result of an APPROVED PROPOSAL to remove the member.

INACCESSIBLE_ENCRYPTION_KEY - The member is impaired and might not function as expected because it cannot access the specified customer managed key in KMS for encryption at rest. Either the KMS key was disabled or deleted, or the grants on the key were revoked. The effect of disabling or deleting a key or of revoking a grant isn't immediate. It might take some time for the member resource to discover that the key is inaccessible. When a resource is in this state, we recommend deleting and recreating the resource.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the member was created.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the member. For more information about ARNs and their format, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the customer managed key in Key Management Service (KMS) that the member uses for encryption at rest. If the value of this parameter is "AWS Owned KMS Key", the member uses an Amazon Web Services owned KMS key for encryption. This parameter is inherited by the nodes that this member owns.
